summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Executive Department - Office of Management and Budget, establishing a position of Assistant Director for Management Information Services and defining the duties thereof, providing for the appointment of said Assistant Director, providing for certain subordinate positions therein, fixing compensation and providing for payment thereof, superseding Ordinance 99554 and all other ordinances to the extent inconsistent herewith, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund, and declaring the emergency therefor.
